title: Calculate Use Tax on Out-of-State Purchase
description: A business in California bought office furniture from an online retailer in Oregon (which has no sales tax) and needs to self-assess and pay California use tax.

tasks.description: Identify the total cost of the furniture purchased from the out-of-state vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains the invoice for the purchase.

tasks.description: Look up the applicable use tax rate for the business's location in California.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct state and local use tax rate.

tasks.description: Calculate the use tax due and include it on the business's next sales and use tax return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the use tax and adds it to the return.
